channel.title: [pi] killStreak help

item.title: [pi] killStreak help
item.dc:creator: @Infinity_Zr Infinity Zr
item.description:
@Infinity_Zr wrote:

Hey, i’m adding a killstreak method to my pi server so im trying to make it so when play dies

o.sendMessage("You're on a killstreak you're killstreak is now +c.killStreak+ ");

here is my Code…

if (Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom != o.lastKilled) { o.pkPoints = (o.pkPoints + 4); o.killStreak = (o.killStreak + 1); o.sendMessage("You're on a killstreak you're killstreak is now +c.killStreak+ "); if(Misc.random(10) == 3) { Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(o, RandomPVP(), c.getX(), c.getY(), 1, c.killerId); } 
                o.lastKilled = Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom;
            } else {
                o.sendMessage("You're killstreak dose not count because you have killed " +c.playerName+ " twice in a row.");
                o.sendMessage("You do not recieve pk points because you have killed " +c.playerName+ " twice in a row.");
            }
        }
    }</blockquote>

If anyone can help . that would be nice

Read full topic
